fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

party_poppers.name: Party Poppers
party_poppers.description: Single pull poppers- great for parties!

standard_candle.name: Standard Candle
standard_candle.description: A favorite of Amish communities for decades!

peony.name: Peony
peony.description: No tails, no trails, just pure crackly, sparkly, globe-shaped bliss.

beehive.name: Beehive
beehive.description: These flurries of colorful stars resemble the frantic swarm-like movements of an angered bee colony.

crosette.name: Crosette
crosette.description: A crosette is like the firework equivalent of planarian reproduction: a comet splits into two at the apex of its launch, and boom, you’ve got a crosette.

roman-candle.name: Roman Candle
roman-candle.description: Roman candles might look awesome, but their steady stream of upward shooting sparks doesn’t exactly make lighting them a date night-friendly activity.

gasoline_garbage.name: Gasoline and Garbage
gasoline_garbage.description: Add a match, and you've got a party.

bottle-rocket.name: Bottle Rocket
bottle-rocket.description: Only fun if you build a contraption that launches at 1,000 of these babies.

thermite.name: Thermite
thermite.description: A mixture of finely powdered aluminum and iron oxide that produces a very high temperature on combustion.

atom_bomb.name: Atomic Bomb
atom_bomb.description: Responsible for the destruction of Hiroshima.

grenade.name: Grenade
grenade.description: A small bomb that you throw.

tnt_plunger.name: TNT Plunger
tnt_plunger.description: Makes deploying TNT a little more safe, unless someone moves the TNT right behind you.

one_ton_weight.name: 1 Ton Weight
one_ton_weight.description: Not explosive, but great for dropping on enemies.
